author: ShadCodez
install_msg:
MusicLinker has been installed!

It will automatically detect Spotify and YouTube music links and reply with a cross-platform search link and a Brave lyrics search.

Use `[p]musiclinker` to configure settings.
name: MusicLinker
short: Cross-platform music link helper with lyrics search.
description: Detects Spotify track links and YouTube video links in chat messages. Replies with a search link to the opposing platform (Spotify ↔ YouTube) and a Brave Search link for lyrics. Uses free oEmbed endpoints — no API keys required.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any end user data. It only reads message content in real time to detect music links.
